calculator.title: Calculadora de inyección de péptidos
calculator.subtitle: Calcule su dosis de péptido con precisión. Ingrese la cantidad de péptido, el volumen de solvente y la dosis deseada.
calculator.step1Desc: Ingrese la cantidad total de péptido en su vial (en mg), como se indica en la etiqueta.
calculator.step2Desc: Ingrese la cantidad de agua bacteriostática que utilizará para reconstituir (en mL).
calculator.step3Desc: Ingrese la dosis deseada por inyección en mcg o mg. La calculadora muestra el volumen exacto a extraer.
calculator.disclaimer: Esta calculadora se proporciona solo con fines informativos para investigación in vitro.

protocols.title: Mis protocolos de investigación
protocols.subtitle: Sigue tus protocolos para maximizar resultados
protocols.createFirst: Crea tu primer protocolo para seguir tu investigación
protocols.tissueRecoveryDesc: Protocolo BPC-157 + TB-500 para recuperación muscular y articular
protocols.weightManagementDesc: Protocolo Semaglutida/Tirzepatida para pérdida de peso
protocols.antiAgingDesc: Protocolo GHK-Cu + Epithalon para regeneración celular
protocols.cognitiveDesc: Protocolo nootrópico con Semax y Selank
protocols.muscleGrowthDesc: Protocolo GHRP-6 + CJC-1295 para masa muscular
protocols.tipDocumentation: Anota todos los efectos para ajustar el protocolo
protocols.pageSubtitle: Track your protocols to maximize your results
protocols.noProtocolsDesc: Create your first protocol to track your research
protocols.tipConsistencyText: Follow administration schedules for optimal results
protocols.tipDocumentationText: Note all effects, even minor ones, to adjust the protocol
protocols.tipDosageText: Start low and gradually increase to evaluate tolerance
protocols.tipNutritionText: Optimize your diet to support the protocol
protocols.tipRecoveryText: Sleep is crucial - aim for 7-9h of quality sleep
protocols.tipHydrationText: Drink 2-3L of water per day minimum
protocols.templateRecoveryDesc: BPC-157 + TB-500 protocol for muscle and joint recovery
protocols.templateRecoveryInstructions:
**Week 1-4:**
- BPC-157: 250-500mcg/day (divided in 2 doses)
- TB-500: 2mg 2x/week

**Week 5-8:**
- BPC-157: 250mcg/day
- TB-500: 2mg 1x/week

**Tips:**
- Inject close to the treatment area
- Maintain a protein-rich diet
- Avoid anti-inflammatory drugs
protocols.templateWeightLossInstructions:
**Progressive titration (Semaglutide):**
- Week 1-4: 0.25mg/week
- Week 5-8: 0.5mg/week
- Week 9-12: 1mg/week
- Week 13+: 1.7-2.4mg/week if tolerated

**Tips:**
- Always inject on the same day
- Eat slowly, small portions
- Important hydration (2L+/day)
- Prioritize protein at each meal
protocols.templateAntiAgingDesc: GHK-Cu + Epithalon protocol for cellular regeneration
protocols.templateAntiAgingInstructions:
**Epithalon (10-20 day cycles):**
- 5-10mg/day SC injection
- 4-6 month break between cycles

**GHK-Cu:**
- Topical: 2x/day on target areas
- Injectable: 1-2mg/day

**NAD+:**
- 250-500mg sublingual or IV

**Tips:**
- Combine with intermittent fasting
- Antioxidants and optimal sleep
protocols.templateCognitiveDesc: Nootropic protocol with Semax and Selank
protocols.templateCognitiveInstructions:
**Semax:**
- 200-600mcg/day intranasal
- Divide into 2-3 doses

**Selank:**
- 250-500mcg/day intranasal
- For anxiety and focus

**Dihexa:**
- 10-20mg/day oral
- Powerful neuroplasticity effect

**Tips:**
- Use in the morning to avoid insomnia
- Combine with cognitive exercise
- Stack with choline/omega-3
protocols.templateMuscleGrowthDesc: GHRP-6 + CJC-1295 protocol for muscle mass
protocols.templateMuscleGrowthInstructions:
**CJC-1295 DAC:**
- 2mg 1-2x/week

**Ipamorelin:**
- 200-300mcg 2-3x/day
- Upon waking, post-workout, before bed

**GHRP-6:**
- 100-200mcg 2-3x/day
- Fasted for best efficacy

**Tips:**
- Resistance training 4-5x/week
- Protein 2g/kg body weight
- Sleep 7-9h/night essential
